sql.i: SELECT FW.WJBM,FW.ZXFW,FW.MDMS,TO_CHAR(FW.XBRQ,'YYYY-MM-DD HH24:MI:SS') AS XBRQ,FW.GKXS,FW.GKYY,FW.FWFS,FW.DZGWFS,FW.ZZGWFS,FW.ZS, FW.CS,FW.QFR,TO_CHAR(FW.QFRQ,'YYYY-MM-DD HH24:MI:SS') AS QFRQ,TO_CHAR(FW.YFRQ,'YYYY-MM-DD HH24:MI:SS') AS YFRQ,FW.FBCC,FW.NGR,TO_CHAR(FW.NGRQ,'YYYY-MM-DD HH24:MI:SS') AS NGRQ,FW.NGRDH,TO_CHAR(FW.CYSJ,'YYYY-MM-DD HH24:MI:SS') AS CYSJ,FW.NGDW,FW.CX,FW.QJ,FW.LX,FW.QFRZW, FW.YFJG,FW.FWJGSM,TO_CHAR(FW.CWRQ,'YYYY-MM-DD HH24:MI:SS') AS CWRQ,FW.FZ,FW.DW, FZXX.WJXS_ID,FZXX.SSDWID,FZXX.WJLX,FZXX.BT,FZXX.MJ,FZXX.BMQX,FZXX.QXLB,FZXX.JJCD,FZXX.ZH,FZXX.NH, FZXX.XH,FZXX.HZ,FZXX.WHXSGZ,FZXX.LLR,FZXX.LLR_ID,TO_CHAR(FZXX.LRSJ,'YYYY-MM-DD HH24:MI:SS') AS LRSJ,FZXX.LRBM,FZXX.LRBM_ID,FZXX.LRDW,FZXX.LRDW_ID,FZXX.NBYJ, FZXX.ZT,FZXX.ZTR,TO_CHAR(FZXX.ZTSJ,'YYYY-MM-DD HH24:MI:SS') AS ZTSJ, FZXX.LSH,FZXX.DZGWBS,FZXX.ISYGD, WJXS.WJXS,WJXS.WZ, N.N_ID,N.FI_ID,N.N_UPERID,N.N_SUBSYSID,N.FI_CLASS,N.FI_OBJECTID,N.N_FR_ID,N.N_FR_NAME,N.N_SEND_UNIT, N.N_SENDER,N.N_SENDER_ID,TO_CHAR(N.N_SEND_DATE,'YYYY-MM-DD HH24:MI:SS') AS N_SEND_DATE,N.N_EXECUTOR, N.N_EXECUTORNAME,N.N_FACT_EXECUTOR,N.N_STATUS,TO_CHAR(N.N_FINISH_DATE,'YYYY-MM-DD HH24:MI:SS') AS N_FINISH_DATE,N.N_LY,N.N_YDBZ,N.N_ISWORK,N.N_DBYXJ,TO_CHAR(N.N_YD_TIME,'YYYY-MM-DD HH24:MI:SS') AS N_YD_TIME, N.N_FFRECID,N.N_LYS,N.N_DB,N.N_ISZHONGDIAN,N.N_PX FROM gw_fw fw,gw_fzxx fzxx,gw_wjxs wjxs,gzl_node n WHERE fw.wjbm = fzxx.wjbm and wjxs.wjxs_id=fzxx.wjxs_id and n.fi_objectid=fw.wjbm AND fw.wjbm=? and n.n_id=?

SELECT FW.WJBM,FW.ZXFW,FW.MDMS,TO_CHAR(FW.XBRQ,'YYYY-MM-DD HH24:MI:SS') AS XBRQ,FW.GKXS,FW.GKYY,FW.FWFS,FW.DZGWFS,FW.ZZGWFS,FW.ZS, FW.CS,FW.QFR,TO_CHAR(FW.QFRQ,'YYYY-MM-DD HH24:MI:SS') AS QFRQ,TO_CHAR(FW.YFRQ,'YYYY-MM-DD HH24:MI:SS') AS YFRQ,FW.FBCC,FW.NGR,TO_CHAR(FW.NGRQ,'YYYY-MM-DD HH24:MI:SS') AS NGRQ,FW.NGRDH,TO_CHAR(FW.CYSJ,'YYYY-MM-DD HH24:MI:SS') AS CYSJ,FW.NGDW,FW.CX,FW.QJ,FW.LX,FW.QFRZW, FW.YFJG,FW.FWJGSM,TO_CHAR(FW.CWRQ,'YYYY-MM-DD HH24:MI:SS') AS CWRQ,FW.FZ,FW.DW, FZXX.WJXS_ID,FZXX.SSDWID,FZXX.WJLX,FZXX.BT,FZXX.MJ,FZXX.BMQX,FZXX.QXLB,FZXX.JJCD,FZXX.ZH,FZXX.NH, FZXX.XH,FZXX.HZ,FZXX.WHXSGZ,FZXX.LLR,FZXX.LLR_ID,TO_CHAR(FZXX.LRSJ,'YYYY-MM-DD HH24:MI:SS') AS LRSJ,FZXX.LRBM,FZXX.LRBM_ID,FZXX.LRDW,FZXX.LRDW_ID,FZXX.NBYJ, FZXX.ZT,FZXX.ZTR,TO_CHAR(FZXX.ZTSJ,'YYYY-MM-DD HH24:MI:SS') AS ZTSJ, FZXX.LSH,FZXX.DZGWBS,FZXX.ISYGD, WJXS.WJXS,WJXS.WZ, N.N_ID,N.FI_ID,N.N_UPERID,N.N_SUBSYSID,N.FI_CLASS,N.FI_OBJECTID,N.N_FR_ID,N.N_FR_NAME,N.N_SEND_UNIT, N.N_SENDER,N.N_SENDER_ID,TO_CHAR(N.N_SEND_DATE,'YYYY-MM-DD HH24:MI:SS') AS N_SEND_DATE,N.N_EXECUTOR, N.N_EXECUTORNAME,N.N_FACT_EXECUTOR,N.N_STATUS,TO_CHAR(N.N_FINISH_DATE,'YYYY-MM-DD HH24:MI:SS') AS N_FINISH_DATE,N.N_LY,N.N_YDBZ,N.N_ISWORK,N.N_DBYXJ,TO_CHAR(N.N_YD_TIME,'YYYY-MM-DD HH24:MI:SS') AS N_YD_TIME, N.N_FFRECID,N.N_LYS,N.N_DB,N.N_ISZHONGDIAN,N.N_PX FROM gw_fw fw,gw_fzxx fzxx,gw_wjxs wjxs,gzl_node n WHERE fw.wjbm = fzxx.wjbm and wjxs.wjxs_id=fzxx.wjxs_id and n.fi_objectid=fw.wjbm and n.n_status=0 and n.n_executor=? AND fw.wjbm=? order by n.n_id desc

SELECT FW.WJBM,FW.ZXFW,FW.MDMS,TO_CHAR(FW.XBRQ,'YYYY-MM-DD HH24:MI:SS') AS XBRQ,FW.GKXS,FW.GKYY,FW.FWFS,FW.DZGWFS,FW.ZZGWFS,FW.ZS, FW.CS,FW.QFR,TO_CHAR(FW.QFRQ,'YYYY-MM-DD HH24:MI:SS') AS QFRQ,TO_CHAR(FW.YFRQ,'YYYY-MM-DD HH24:MI:SS') AS YFRQ,FW.FBCC,FW.NGR,TO_CHAR(FW.NGRQ,'YYYY-MM-DD HH24:MI:SS') AS NGRQ,FW.NGRDH,TO_CHAR(FW.CYSJ,'YYYY-MM-DD HH24:MI:SS') AS CYSJ,FW.NGDW,FW.CX,FW.QJ,FW.LX,FW.QFRZW, FW.YFJG,FW.FWJGSM,TO_CHAR(FW.CWRQ,'YYYY-MM-DD HH24:MI:SS') AS CWRQ,FW.FZ,FW.DW, FZXX.WJXS_ID,FZXX.SSDWID,FZXX.WJLX,FZXX.BT,FZXX.MJ,FZXX.BMQX,FZXX.QXLB,FZXX.JJCD,FZXX.ZH,FZXX.NH, FZXX.XH,FZXX.HZ,FZXX.WHXSGZ,FZXX.LLR,FZXX.LLR_ID,TO_CHAR(FZXX.LRSJ,'YYYY-MM-DD HH24:MI:SS') AS LRSJ,FZXX.LRBM,FZXX.LRBM_ID,FZXX.LRDW,FZXX.LRDW_ID,FZXX.NBYJ, FZXX.ZT,FZXX.ZTR,TO_CHAR(FZXX.ZTSJ,'YYYY-MM-DD HH24:MI:SS') AS ZTSJ, FZXX.LSH,FZXX.DZGWBS,FZXX.ISYGD, WJXS.WJXS,WJXS.WZ, N.N_ID,N.FI_ID,N.N_UPERID,N.N_SUBSYSID,N.FI_CLASS,N.FI_OBJECTID,N.N_FR_ID,N.N_FR_NAME,N.N_SEND_UNIT, N.N_SENDER,N.N_SENDER_ID,TO_CHAR(N.N_SEND_DATE,'YYYY-MM-DD HH24:MI:SS') AS N_SEND_DATE,N.N_EXECUTOR, N.N_EXECUTORNAME,N.N_FACT_EXECUTOR,N.N_STATUS,TO_CHAR(N.N_FINISH_DATE,'YYYY-MM-DD HH24:MI:SS') AS N_FINISH_DATE,N.N_LY,N.N_YDBZ,N.N_ISWORK,N.N_DBYXJ,TO_CHAR(N.N_YD_TIME,'YYYY-MM-DD HH24:MI:SS') AS N_YD_TIME, N.N_FFRECID,N.N_LYS,N.N_DB,N.N_ISZHONGDIAN,N.N_PX FROM gw_fw fw,gw_fzxx fzxx,gw_wjxs wjxs,gzl_node n WHERE fw.wjbm = fzxx.wjbm and wjxs.wjxs_id=fzxx.wjxs_id and n.fi_objectid=fw.wjbm and n.n_executor=? AND fw.wjbm=? order by n.n_id desc

SELECT DISTINCT FW.WJBM,FW.ZXFW,FW.MDMS,TO_CHAR(FW.XBRQ,'YYYY-MM-DD HH24:MI:SS') AS XBRQ,FW.GKXS,FW.GKYY,FW.FWFS,FW.DZGWFS,FW.ZZGWFS,FW.ZS, FW.CS,FW.QFR,TO_CHAR(FW.QFRQ,'YYYY-MM-DD HH24:MI:SS') AS QFRQ,TO_CHAR(FW.YFRQ,'YYYY-MM-DD HH24:MI:SS') AS YFRQ,FW.FBCC,FW.NGR,TO_CHAR(FW.NGRQ,'YYYY-MM-DD HH24:MI:SS') AS NGRQ,FW.NGRDH,TO_CHAR(FW.CYSJ,'YYYY-MM-DD HH24:MI:SS') AS CYSJ,FW.NGDW,FW.CX,FW.QJ,FW.LX,FW.QFRZW, FW.YFJG,FW.FWJGSM,TO_CHAR(FW.CWRQ,'YYYY-MM-DD HH24:MI:SS') AS CWRQ,FW.FZ,FW.DW, FZXX.WJXS_ID,FZXX.SSDWID,FZXX.WJLX,FZXX.BT,FZXX.MJ,FZXX.BMQX,FZXX.QXLB,FZXX.JJCD,FZXX.ZH,FZXX.NH, FZXX.XH,FZXX.HZ,FZXX.WHXSGZ,FZXX.LLR,FZXX.LLR_ID,TO_CHAR(FZXX.LRSJ,'YYYY-MM-DD HH24:MI:SS') AS LRSJ,FZXX.LRBM,FZXX.LRBM_ID,FZXX.LRDW,FZXX.LRDW_ID,FZXX.NBYJ, FZXX.ZT,FZXX.ZTR,TO_CHAR(FZXX.ZTSJ,'YYYY-MM-DD HH24:MI:SS') AS ZTSJ, FZXX.LSH,FZXX.DZGWBS,FZXX.ISYGD, WJXS.WJXS,WJXS.WZ FROM GW_FZXX FZXX,GW_FW FW,GW_WJXS WJXS WHERE FW.WJBM=FZXX.WJBM AND WJXS.WJLX='发文' AND FZXX.WJXS_ID=WJXS.WJXS_ID AND (FZXX.ZT IS NULL or FZXX.ZT<>-1)
SELECT * FROM GDZC_BGYPLF FW,GW_FZXX FZXX,GW_WJXS WJXS,GZL_NODE N WHERE FW.WJBM = FZXX.WJBM AND WJXS.WJXS_ID=FZXX.WJXS_ID AND N.FI_OBJECTID=FW.WJBM AND FW.WJBM=? AND N.N_ID=?
SELECT * FROM GDZC_ZCJJ FW,GW_FZXX FZXX,GW_WJXS WJXS,GZL_NODE N WHERE FW.WJBM = FZXX.WJBM AND WJXS.WJXS_ID=FZXX.WJXS_ID AND N.FI_OBJECTID=FW.WJBM AND FW.WJBM=? AND N.N_ID=?
SELECT * FROM GDZC_WSBF FW,GW_FZXX FZXX,GW_WJXS WJXS,GZL_NODE N WHERE FW.WJBM = FZXX.WJBM AND WJXS.WJXS_ID=FZXX.WJXS_ID AND N.FI_OBJECTID=FW.WJBM AND FW.WJBM=? AND N.N_ID=?
